College_Summary: IIT Roorkee is an autonomous technical and research University located in Roorkee, Uttarakhand. Established in 1847 as Thomason College of Civil Engineering, IIT Roorkee is Asia's oldest technical university. The main campus of IIT Roorkee is located in Roorkee, Haridwar District over an area of 358.5 acres. IIT Roorkee also has 2 other campuses, one in Saharanpur (around 30 Km from Roorkee) and another one in Greater Noida. IIT Roorkee is ranked as #1 in the top architecture colleges in India by NIRF 2023. In the engineering category, IIT Roorkee has been ranked 5th in NIRF 2023 Ranking.

College_Summary: IIM Kashipur is among the second-generation IIMs established in 2011. IIM Kashipur was ranked 19th by NIRF 2023 among the top management institutes in India. IIM Kashipur is known for its 2-year flagship MBA program which offers admission through CAT. The cutoff is 94 percentile overall and 73 percentile for sectional. IIM Kashipur MBA fee is INR 17.30 lakhs, whereas IIM Kashipur average package stood at INR 18.11 LPA and IIM Kashipur highest package stood at INR 37 LPA for the batch 2023.

College_Summary: IMS Unison University (IUU) is a management institute rated as one of the top private Universities in India. The university is ranked 6th in the Best Private University category and 18th in the best B-School category by Times of India in its 2022 rankings. IMS Unison University offers 18 unique programs at Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Doctoral level in the field of Management, Law, Hospitality Management, Mass Communication and Liberal Arts.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts [BA] (Journalism and Mass Communication)

College_Summary: Govind Ballabh Pant University of Technology and Agriculture (GBPUAT), also known as Pantnagar University, was established in 1960 in Pantnagar, Uttarakhand. It currently offers 2 Undergraduate­, 8 Postgraduate and 7 Ph.D courses. The UG courses offered are B.Sc. and B.Tech, and the PG courses are M.Sc., M.tech., MVSc, MBA, MCA and M.Sc. Agri., as well as a Diploma in Hi-Tech Agriculture and 7 PhD courses. Admission to the courses usually begins by the end of March.

DBS Dehradun, also known as Doon Business School is located in Uttarakhand. It was established under Eskay Educational Trust in the year 2007. The college is rated among the top MBA colleges in India and is ranked the best MBA college in Uttarakhand. DBS Dehradun is also accredited by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is approved by UGC. In comparison to other universities, the overall fee structure for DBS Dehradun is more affordable. Popular courses in DBS Dehradun include PGDM and MBA. Students can apply to the university through offline and online methods. The application fee is INR 750.

College_Name: Institute of Hotel Management Catering Technology & Applied Nutrition - [IHM], Dehradun
College_Summary: Institute of Hotel Management, Catering Technology & Applied Nutrition (IHM), Dehradun established in 2006, is one of the top hotel management institutes across the country. The institute is affiliated to Indira Gandhi National Open University. IHM Dehradun offers B.Sc. in Hospitality & Hotel Administration at the UG level awarded by NCHMCT. There are also short term courses like PG Diploma and Diploma. The institute has excellent infrastructural facilities and also provides an eco-friendly environment for students.

The college has ranked 97 overall by Outlook 2020 and ranked 88 for MBA by India Today 2020. Uttaranchal Institute of Management offers 4 full-time courses in various streams. It offers courses including MBA, BBA, B.Com (Horns.), M.Com. The admissions are based on both merit and entrance exams like CAT, MAT, XAT, CMAT. Application mode is both online and offline.

College_Summary: Forest Research Institute (Deemed to be University) Dehradun is first to begin forest research in India. After independence, it was renamed as Forest Research Institute and Colleges. In 1988 FRI Dehradun was considered as one of the institutes under autonomous organizations ICFRE (Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change- Government of India). The institute offers masters, diplomas and doctoral programs. The admissions to all the courses of the institution is done on the basis of various entrance test conducted by the institute itself. Check FRI Dehradun Admission 2022

Wildlife Institute of India (WII) was established in 1982 in Dehradun under the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change, Government of India. The college was established as an autonomous institute in 1986. Wildlife Institute of India (WII) is affiliated with the Academy of Scientific and Innovative Research (ACSIR). WII Dehradun offers a Master in Wildlife Science, Masters in Heritage Conservation and Management, M.Sc. in Freshwater Ecology and Conservation, PG Diploma in Advance Wildlife Management, Certificate Courses and Short Term Courses. The institute has 8 departments. Wildlife Institute of India grants admission to Indian and Foreign students. For admission to the M.Sc. course, students must appear for the NET entrance exam. For the Diploma and Certificate courses, Foreign Government and State Forest Departments send their best candidates who have experience in this field.

College_Name: Doon Post Graduate College of Agriculture Science and Technology - [DCAST], Dehradun
College_Summary: Doon Post Graduate College of Agriculture Science and Technology (DCAST), Dehradun, established in 2000, is affiliated to Hemwati Nandan Bahuguna Garhwal University and approved by AICTE & NAAC. The institution works under Ch. Charan Singh Memorial Educational Society and Maharani Lakshmi Bai Memorial Educational Society. The college offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Agriculture Science, Management, Arts, Computer Application, Education, Hotel Management, and many more.

Dehradun Institute of Technology was formed in 1998 by the Unison group and was established by Govt. of Uttarakhand vide Act No.10. It is a private institution that has partnerships with ASSOCHAM India, FICCI, and CII. DIT University and its degrees are recognized by the UGC, New Delhi, and by the Nepal Engineering Council. DIT University is a member of the Association of Indian Universities. The Pharmacy Council of India has approved the B.Pharm Program, and the Council of Architecture has approved the BArch Program.

Doon University is one of the best Universities in the country and has been leading since its inception year 2009. The university is located in the year lush green serene location of Shivalik range and it aims to provide areas of research and methods of pedagogy. It is a unitary and fully residential university, follows the Credit System of Study. The university imparts education in various Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Research Level Courses.

College_Name: Seema Dental College and Hospital, Rishikesh
College_Summary: Seema Dental College and Hospital (SDCH), established in 2003, is a private college affiliated to HNB Garhwal University and approved by Dental Council of India. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Dental Science.

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: AICTE, PCI, BCI, ICAR, UGC, AIU

College_Summary: Uttaranchal University was established in 2013 and is a group of institutes that includes Law College Dehradun (2002), Uttaranchal Institute of Management, Uttaranchal Institute of Technology (2006), Uttaranchal Institute of Pharmaceutical Science, School of Agriculture, University Polytechnic and school of applied and life science (2016). School of Hospitality Management and School of Media and communication studies (2018), School of Liberal Arts (2019). It is accredited by NAAC with a grade of A+.

Graphic Era University (GEU), formerly known as Graphic Era Institute of Technology, is one of the leading universities in developing India as it has become a popular university in a concise span of time. It has also been ranked 65th by the NIRF 2023 in Management. The Institute also secure rank 55th in University, 62nd in Engineering and 89th in Overall category. The university offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Doctoral programs in streams like Engineering, Management, Computer Application, Humanities & Social Sciences, Commerce, Life Sciences, Hotel management, and Hospitality. Among these the most popular courses are B.Tech, B.Sc, and B.E.

College_Summary: The Uttarakhand State Legislature established Quantum University through the Quantum University Act 2016 in Roorkee, Uttarakhand. It is recognized by UGC and BCI. The university is also approved by PCI. It provides various Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Doctoral courses in the fields of Engineering, Computer Applications, Management, Media Studies & Design, Commerce & Finance, Science, Humanities & Social Science, Agricultural Studies, Health Sciences and Hospitality & Tourism and Law. The university has 8 schools to provide higher education in different fields. Admission to Quantum University is entrance and merit-based. The institute conducts a Quantum Entrance cum Scholarship Test (Q-Care) & Quantum University Research Aptitude Test (QRAT) for UG and Ph.D. courses respectively. The campus of the university comprises aesthetically designed infrastructure including state-of-the-art internet and computer facilities, workshops, libraries, laboratories, seminar halls and many more facilities. The institute also offers job opportunities to students with some of the top organizations like Wipro, TCS, Capgemini, Quick Heal, Tech Mahindra, etc.

It was set up under the foundation of the Graphic Era Education Society (GEES) in 1996 as a non profit organization. The university has got recognition from University Grants Commission (UGC) and is a member of Association of Indian Universities (AIU). It has also been accredited by NAAC.

College_Summary: ICFAI University was established in 2003 and is recognized by UGC, NCTE, and BCI. It is also approved by AICTE and accredited by NAAC. The University offers undergraduate, postgraduate, doctoral as well as distance courses in various specializations. Admission in all the courses is based on merit in qualifying examination and interview. Interested candidates can apply to this University online or offline.

College_Summary: The university came into existence in 2003 with the motive of preparing trained human resources for the industry in several sectors like social, educational, scientific, technical, and professional organizations for social and economic development. Carrying the vision of building itself as a world-class university among others and vocalizing about higher education through different modes of learning in the process of meeting currently required demands of the industry and a mission to provide higher education not only face to face but also through different advanced technology modes so that people who are deprived of education because of whatever reasons can either start it again from home, the university tries to stand out. Read More: HZU Courses & Fee

Patanjali University, established in 2006 at Haridwar is named after the great Indian sage Patanjali, who was the first to collate various writings on Yoga. The University is sponsored by Patanjali Yogpeeth Trust and approved by UGC. This institute was set up due to the inability of the modern education system to restrict oneself to gain information only for employment purposes. It offers UG, PG, Ph.D., Diploma, and Certificate courses in various specializations of Yoga and also provides various facilities for the students' all-round development.

College_Summary: Motherhood University, Roorkee was established in 2015 and is recognized by UGC and BCI. The University is also approved by AICTE, NCTE and Pharmacy Council of India. The university offers a range of Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in various disciplines. Admission is primarily based on academic merit.

College_Summary: Tula’s Institute was founded in 2006 by Rishabh Educational Trust and is considered to be one of the ‘Top Engineering College in Uttarakhand’ having excellent academic programs ranging from undergraduate to the postgraduate level. The institute believes in providing the best possible facilities for its students. Tula’s endeavor is to create a congenial atmosphere to nurture talent through the support and guidance of experienced faculty with access to state of the art infrastructure.

JB Institute of Technology (JBIT) is a private technical institute established in 2009 at Uttarakhand, Dehradun. It is affiliated to the Uttarakhand Board of Technical Education, Roorkee & Uttarakhand Technical University. The institute has been approved by the Ministry of HRD, New Delhi, and AICTE. It offers courses under the UG, PG domain as well as Diploma courses in the field of engineering, applied sciences, and management. The institute has also maintained a great placement record over the years.

College_Name: THDC Institute of Hydro Power Engineering and Technology, Garhwal
College_Summary: THDC Institute of Hydropower Engineering and Technology was set up in the year 2011. It is spread across a vast 40 acres of land near the famous Tehri Dam of Uttarakhand. The institute is affiliated to Uttarakhand Technical University, Dehradun & is approved by AICTE. THDC IHET offers a Bachelor of Technology across 6 streams. The admissions courses are on the basis of the JEE Mains score.

Swami Rama Himalayan University (SRHU), Dehradun offers more than 100+ UG, PG and Doctoral prorams in various disciplines. The flagship courses are B.Tech(CSE), BBA, B.Com (Hons), BCA at UG level and MBA, MCA, M.Tech. M.Sc across multiple streams at PG level. Admission to courses are on the basis of entrance exams such as JEE Main, NEET, MAT, CAT etc. while for most of them, admission is done through the merit of last qualifying exams.

Shri Guru Ram Rai University (SGRU) is specialized in 103 courses of 10 streams. Graduates from the university are placed in companies such as Accenture, Apex Pharma, Axis Bank, Bajaj Capital, DA Milano, Deloitte, Genpact, etc. SGRRU offers UG, PG, Diploma, Doctoral, and Certificate courses in the fields of Arts, Science, Commerce, Medical, Management, etc. Admission to the same is merit-based.

College_Summary: College of Engineering, (COER Roorkee) was established by Seth Roshan Lal Jain Trust is the year 1998. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses, namely, B.Tech. in eight different specializations and M.Tech. in two different specializations. There are 810 seats and 36 seats in B.Tech. and M.Tech., respectively.

College_Summary: Roorkee Institute of Technology (RIT), Roorkee, established in 2005 is a private institute affiliated to the Uttarakhand Technical University. It has been graded A++ by National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC), first and only institute in Uttarakhand. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses across Engineering, Management, Agriculture and Paramedical Sciences.

Shivalik College of Engineering (SCE) Dehradun, is one of the leading engineering colleges in Uttarakhand in terms of quality education. With a lush green eco-friendly campus spreading over 20 acres. SCE is affiliated to Uttarakhand Technical University. The college offers B.Tech and Diploma in Engineering. Admission in SCE is based on the merit obtained in the entrance test for B.Tech. For admission in Diploma in engineering, the admission is based on the merit obtained in the qualifying examination.

College_Summary: Haridwar University, Roorkee formerly known as Roorkee College of Engineering is awarded the “Best Upcoming Engineering College in Uttarakhand Award” under CMAI National Uttarakhand Award Jointly by CMAI, AICTE, UTU and awarded the “Best Technical Institute in Uttarakhand Award” by CMAI, AICTE, and MTU. Haridwar University offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma programs in the discipline of Engineering, Pharmacy, Management, Tourism Management, etc.

Women Institute of Technology (WIT), Dehradun was established in the year 2012, owes its affiliation to Uttarakhand Technical University (UTU), Dehradun, and deems to be one of the first four colleges established under the university. It is the first women-only college established under the state government of Uttarakhand. The college offers B.Tech courses in five branches of engineering including civil, mechanical, electrical, electronics & communication, and computer science engineering, especially for providing academic opportunities to women.

Indian Institute of Aeronautical Engineering (IIAE), Dehradun is a college of aircraft engineering founded in 1992. It is affiliated to the University of America California (USA) and has been approved by OTHM (UK) for the Endorsed Learning Program. The institute offers Bachelor’s degree, HND program in Aerospace/Aeronautical, and an Associate degree with Pilot Training. Registration for the courses can be done online by accessing the institute’s website.

College_Name: Indira Gandhi National Forest Academy - [IGNFA], Dehradun
College_Summary: Indira Gandhi National Forest Academy (IGNFA) was established in 1938 and constituted in 1987. The institute provides an M.Phil. in Environmental Technology as a full-time degree course. It also offers IFS and Forest Services Training. Indira Gandhi National Forest Academy offers much special skill training to its students with on-the-job training and special tours/excursions. The admission to the institute is done based on merit. The application process is online.

Bipin Tripathi  Kumaon Institute of Technology, Almora
Institute of Technology and Management - [ITM], Dehradun
College_Summary: Institute of Technology & Management (ITM), Dehradun is recognized as one of the first institutes in Uttarakhand State providing pioneered IT education. The institute is known for its on-campus recruitment. The highest salary package offered amounts to INR 50 LPA from company TCS. ITM Dehradun offers UG and PG courses in International Technology, Computer Application, Business Administration, and many more. Admission is done on the basis of merit and on a first-come first-served basis. ITM ranked 77 in all India Ranking and 5th in Top Colleges in Uttarakhand by Times of India, 2021.

College_Summary: BFIT Group of Institutions or BFIT, Dehradun was established by the shadow of Kartar Educational & Cultural Society in 2002 and is affiliated to H.N.B Garhwal Central University. BFIT has 3 campuses in the valley with 5000+ students. The institute offers UG, PG and Diploma Courses in the Disciplines of Science, Humanities, Law, Engineering and Management. The most popular courses of the institute include BA+LLB integrated program, B.tech across 5 specializations, B.Pharma, MCA, BA in Journalism and Mass Communication, MBA and BBA courses. Apart from that, BFIT also runs BA, MA, LLB, LLM, BHM, MHA, MPH, etc. Among the Diploma courses, the institute offers a Diploma in Polytechnic, D.Pharma and Diploma in Hotel Management courses. Admission is based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying exam. Check: BFIT Dehradun Admission

College_Name: Graphic Era Hill University Bhimtal Campus (GEHU)
College_Summary: Graphic Era Hill University (GEHU) was established in the year 2011 by an act of the Uttarakhand State under the aegis of Graphic Era Educational Society. The university has one of its campuses in Bhimtal, Uttarakhand. Graphic Era University is a private university. It is a UGC affiliated university. Graphic Era Hill University offers 65 undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programs across disciplines like engineering and technology, computer applications, management, allied sciences, humanities and social studies, architecture and planning, commerce and law. Graphic Era Hill University aims to provide higher education to the youth in every sector.

Sardar Bhagwan Singh University has been granted the status of a University by the Government of Uttarakhand in the year 2018. The University is the centre of excellence in the area of Allied Health Sciences,Pharmaceutical Sciences, Life Sciences, and Agricultural Sciences. Previously it was known as Sardar Bhagwan Singh Post Graduate Institute of Biomedical Sciences & Research which was the first and the oldest Institute of North India.

College_Name: Nanhi Pari Seemant Engineering Institute - [NPSEI], Pithoragarh
College_Summary: Nanhi Pari Seemant Engineering Institute (NPSEI) Pithoragarh formerly known as the Seemant Institute of Technology was established in the year 2011. It is affiliated to Uttarakhand Technical University and has been approved by AICTE. The institute offers B.Tech programs in five engineering specializations having an intake capacity of 60 seats in each of the specializations. Admissions to the program are based on JEE Mains scores followed by UTU counselling. The highest salary package offered here is INR 2.35 LPA

College_Name: Uttaranchal College of Science & Technology - [UCST], Dehradun
College_Summary: Uttaranchal College of Science & Technology (UCST) Dehradun is a leading institute engaged in Academic cum  Professional Field(s) of study at undergraduate & postgraduate levels under the able guidance and supervision of an academician & educationist of repute & fame. It was founded by Uttaranchal Progressive Educational  Society, HQ II-A Sewak Ashram Road, Dehradun. The institute, working under Self Financing Scheme, offers an academic area, which helps students keep pace, and stay pace with educational program (s), and has relevance to the professional life of the students.

Institute of Technology, Gopeshwar was established in 2013 managed under the Uttarakhand Technical University. The College is located at Chamoli Gopeshwar, Uttarakhand. The Institute is affiliated with Veer Madho Singh Bhandari Uttarakhand Technological University, AICTE.

Maya Group of Colleges (MGC) is located in Selaqui, a developing industry town on NH-72, Dehradun. The institute comes under the aegis of the Maya Devi Educational Foundation. MGC Dehradun offers degree and diploma programs in the discipline of Engineering, Management, Science, Education and many more.

College offers Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA), Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com), Master of Commerce (M.Com) and Master of International Business (MIB) courses. College has 5000 books in the library.

College_Name: GRD Institute of Management And Technology
College_Summary: GRD Institute of Management And Technology is a private institute and one of the top 10 colleges in Dehradun. The institute offers M.Tech and MBA at PG level and B.Tech and BCA programs at the UG level. In addition to this, the institute has also introduced Bachelor of Hotel Management and Diploma in Hotel Management. Admission to all the MBA programs is done on the basis of valid CAT/MAT/XAT etc. scores in the respective discipline while for M.Tech candidates who have appeared for the GATE exam would be given preference. Admission to B.Tech is based on JEE Score.

College_Summary: Minerva Institute of Technology and Management was established in the year 2009 and is affiliated to Sri Dev Suman Uttarakhand University. The Institute is also approved by the Government of Uttarakhand. Various UG, PG programmes are offered by the Institute in numerous specializations. It also offers Diploma, Advance Diploma and Certification programmes in numerous specializations whose eligibility and duration vary with the course opted by the students.

College_Summary: Mahadevi Institute of Technology (MIT), established in 2006, is situated in Dehradun, Uttarakhand. It offers several courses in the field of Business Administration, Arts, Science and Computer Application at Undergraduate and Postgraduate level.

Some of the potential recruiters are Wipro, HCL, Microsoft, Tech Mahindra, L&T, Mindtree, etc.

College_Summary: Alpine Group of Institutes (AGI), Dehradun, established in 1994, is one of the leading premier educational groups in Uttarakhand. It is affiliated to Hemvati Nandan Bahuguna Garhwal University and is approved by AICTE, PCI, DGCA & MHRD. It offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses ranging from the field of Management studies, Hotel Management and Life Sciences to Engineering (Polytechnic Diploma), Aircraft Maintenance Engineering, Information Technology, Diploma in Pharmacy, Forestry, Agriculture, and PG courses in Physics, Chemistry, Zoology, Botany, Biotechnology and Microbiology, all under the NIAE Education Society, Dehradun.

The college provides B.tech courses in computer science & technology, electrical engineering, mechanical engineering and Electronics & Communication Engineering.   Beside teaching college also conducts various extracurricular activities like technical festivals, sports etc. College has state of art infrastructure which includes library, stadium, gym, labs, etc.  College also publishes Tri monthly magazine “Nabhag” is published where students got chance to show their talents in language and writing skills. Each and Every year college also provides scholarships to top 3 students in each branch and also provides facilities like extra books, certificates, free photocopies etc.

College_Summary:
Shriram Institute of Management & Technology, Udham Singh Nagar, Uttarakhand, The Shriram Institute of Management and Technology (SIMT) is a part of the social welfare and education society in Kashipur. Since, many years, the young generation of this region was facing problem of acquiring higher education in professional courses. With this as a motive, the society decided to set up this institute at Kashipur. The Institute is dedicated to providing quality education at the graduate and postgraduate levels.
The institute was established on July 01, 2004. The Institute operates through its own permanent premises since its inception. The Institute currently offers an  MBA, B.Ed., BBA, BCA and PGDCA courses.

College_Summary: Dayanand Brijendra Swarup (Post-Graduation) college popularly known as D.B.S (P.G.) College was established in July 1961 in Dehradun. The college offers UG courses in 13 subjects and PG courses in 11 subjects under the faculty of Science and Arts. DBS is popular for its specialization in Science courses. The college also provides Self-finance as well as Add On/ Vocational Courses. Eligibility for UG courses is 10 + 2 passed whereas for PG courses is bachelor’s degree in a relevant field. Admission is strictly based on the merit obtained in an intermediate or an equivalent examination. Seats are reserved for SC, ST, OBC, and PWD. For regular courses, 90% of seats in the college are reserved for candidates of Uttarakhand and 10% for other states.

The college is affiliated to Hemwanti Nandan Bahuguna Garhwal University and accredited Grade 'B' by NAAC. The aim of the institute is to fulfil the changing needs of education at national and international levels.

College_Name: Ram Chandra Uniyal Government Post Graduate College, Uttarkashi
College_Summary: Shri Guru Ram Rai PG College (SGRRPC) is an Arts and Science college offering 17 courses in 4 different streams. It has various full-time UG and PG courses UG courses run by the college include BA and B.Sc in multiple disciplines PG courses offered by the college includes MA and M.Sc. It also provides some Certification courses as well with the total enrollments of 2,005 students in the academic year of 2019. Admission to the college is merit-based.

Swami Vivekanand Government Post Graduate College is a leading institution in Uttrakhand. The college was established with the aim “quality training commitment to excellence”. It envisions in imparting quality training with devotion to excellence. The college endorses to convey value added education with effective and capable manpower, outstanding infrastructure and modernization in teacher's training and research programs in order to produce worldwide competitive and skilled teachers. It offers both undergraduate and postgraduate courses and is affiliated to Kumaon University. The College is blessed to have lush green fields around itself and is amidst the great Himalange of Lohaghat. The institution was founded in 1979 and has achieved global standards in education according to the Chairman.

The institute offers M.Tech across one specialization at the PG level and Ph.D. in Science and Engineering at the Doctoral level. CBRI Roorkee provides high-quality research education with its well-educated faculties and consists of excellent infrastructural facilities. Candidates can apply online for admission.

The institute offers Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS) and Master of Dental Surgery (MDS) at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels, respectively in the field of Dental Sciences. Admission to BDS and MDS at UDMRI is based on NEET UG and NEET MDS, respectively.
